title: How can I exit the simple home screen?
answer: Swipe left or right on the screen and touch Standard home. Your phone will exit the simple home screen and show all the options of the standar[d home screen again. ]() ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140238) [![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140239)]() The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
